query:
ALTER TABLE dojo_settings 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS twilioAccountSid VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS twilioAuthToken VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS twilioPhoneNumber VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS enableSmsForLeads INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS emailProvider VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'sendgrid',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS senderEmail VARCHAR(320),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS sendgridApiKey VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS smtpHost VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS smtpPort INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS smtpUser VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS smtpPassword VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS enableEmailForLeads INT DEFAULT 0;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user aYsLc9eZnrL9DEu.43c395b54aa0 --database 2Awpr243D2Jitpj6Cn66Rx --execute ALTER TABLE dojo_settings 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS twilioAccountSid VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS twilioAuthToken VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS twilioPhoneNumber VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS enableSmsForLeads INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS emailProvider VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'sendgrid',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS senderEmail VARCHAR(320),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS sendgridApiKey VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS smtpHost VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS smtpPort INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS smtpUser VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS smtpPassword VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS enableEmailForLeads INT DEFAULT 0;
